member.name: M:NMKR.Api.Controllers.CancelAddressReservationController.Get(System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Cancels a address reservation (project id)
member.remarks: When you call this API, the reservation of all nfts dedicated to this address will released to free state. This function can be called, when a user closes his browser or when he hit on a "Cancel Reservation" Button

The id of your project
The address which has to be canceled
member.response: Cancellation was successful
The access was denied. (Wrong or expired APIKEY, wrong projectid etc.)
Address not found
Address is not in active state - eg. already paid or already released to free
Internal server error - see the errormessage in the result

member.name: M:NMKR.Api.Controllers.CheckAddressController.Get(System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Checks an address for state changes (project id)
member.remarks:
You can call this api to check if a user has paid to this particular address or if the address has expired. The reserved/sold NFTs will only filled after the amount was fully paid. This is for security reasons. In the reserved state, only the nft ids and tokenamount are submitted
IMPORTANT: This function uses an internal cache. All results will be cached for 10 seconds. You do not need to call this function more than once in 10 seconds, because the results will be the same.
member.param: The apikey you have created on NMKR Studio
The id of your project
The address you want to check
member.response: Returns the Apiresultclass with the information about the address incl. the assigned NFTs
The access was denied. (Wrong or expired APIKEY, wrong projectid etc.)
The address was not found in our database or not assiged to this project

member.summary: GetAddressForRandomNftSale - Returns an payin address for a random nft sale

member.name: M:NMKR.Api.Controllers.GetAddressForRandomNftSaleController.#ctor(StackExchange.Redis.IConnectionMultiplexer)
member.summary: Returns an address for a random nft sale

member.name: M:NMKR.Api.Controllers.GetAddressForRandomNftSaleController.Get(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int64,System.String)
member.summary: Returns an address for a random nft sale (project id)
member.remarks:
When you call this API, you will receive an address where the buyer has to pay the amount of ada you define. The address will be monitored until it exipred. The count of nft will be reserved until it expires or the buyer has send the ada to this address. If the buyer has send the amount of ada, the nfts will be minted and send to his senderaddress and the nfts state changes to sold.
IMPORTANT: Please notice, that the call is limited to 300 addressreservations per minute. You will get the error 429 if you call this routine more than 300 times a minute. Please do not implement this function on your start page. And please prevent the call of this function from bots with a captcha.
member.param: The apikey you have created on NMKR Studio
The id of your project
The count of the nft/tokens you want to mint and send.
The adaamount the buyer has to send in lovelace - so 1 ADA is 1000000 lovelace
(Optional) A referer code
member.response: Returns the GetPaymentAddressResultClass Class
The access was denied. (Wrong or expired APIKEY, wrong projectid etc.)
No more nft available
The demanded ada amount is too less. The minimium is 5 ADA - eg 5000000 lovelace
Internal server error - see the errormessage in the result

member.name: M:NMKR.Api.Controllers.UploadNftController.Post(System.String,System.Int32,NMKR.Shared.Classes.UploadNftClass)
member.summary: Upload a File to a project and pin it to IPFS
member.remarks: With this API you can upload a file to IPFS and add it to a project. You can upload the file as BASE64 Content or as URL Link or as IPFS Hash. If you submit Metadata, this Metadata will be used instead of the Metadatatemplate from the project. You can either submit Metadata or MetadataPlaceholder, but not both (because it makes no sense). The Metadata field is optional and if you dont use it, it will use the Template from your project. It is poosible to mix both versions in one project. You can have one nft with own metadata and other nfts with the template.
member.param: The apikey you have created on NMKR Studio
The id of your project
The UploadNft Class as Body Content

member.name: M:NMKR.Api.Controllers.v2.GetPaymentAddressForRandomNftSaleController.#ctor(StackExchange.Redis.IConnectionMultiplexer)

member.name: M:NMKR.Api.Controllers.v2.GetPaymentAddressForRandomNftSaleController.Get(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int64,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns an address for a random nft sale (project id)
member.remarks:
When you call this API, you will receive an address where the buyer has to pay the amount of ada you define. The address will be monitored until it exipred. The count of nft will be reserved until it expires or the buyer has send the ada to this address. If the buyer has send the amount of ada, the nfts will be minted and send to his senderaddress and the nfts state changes to sold.
IMPORTANT: Please notice, that the call is limited to 300 addressreservations per minute. You will get the error 429 if you call this routine more than 300 times a minute. Please do not implement this function on your start page. And please prevent the call of this function from bots with a captcha.
member.param: The apikey you have created on NMKR Studio
The uid of your project
The count of the nft/tokens you want to mint and send.
The adaamount the buyer has to send in lovelace - so 1 ADA is 1000000 lovelace
The IP-Address from your Customer
(Optional) A referer code
member.response: Returns the GetPaymentAddressResultClass Class
The access was denied. (Wrong or expired APIKEY, wrong projectid etc.)
No more nft available
The demanded ada amount is too less. The minimium is 5 ADA - eg 5000000 lovelace
Internal server error - see the errormessage in the result

member.remarks:
You will receive a list with all of your projects
IMPORTANT: This function uses an internal cache. All results will be cached for 10 seconds. You do not need to call this function more than once in 10 seconds, because the results will be the same.

member.response: Returns the NftProjectsDetails Class

member.name: M:NMKR.Api.Controllers.v2.MintAndSendRandomController.Get(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Mints random Nfts and sends it to an Address
member.remarks: When you call this API, random NFTs will be selected, minted and send to an ada address. You will need ADA in your Account for the transaction and minting costs.
member.param: The apikey you have created on NMKR Studio
The uid of your project
The count of the nft you want to mint and send
The address you want to send the nft
member.response: Returns the Nft Class
The access was denied. (Wrong or expired APIKEY, wrong projectid etc.)
No more nft available
Too less ADA in your account. Fill up ADA first before try to mint and send
There are pending transactions on the sender address (your account address). Please wait a second
The receiveraddress is not a valid cardano address
Internal server error - see the errormessage in the result

member.name: M:NMKR.Api.Controllers.v2.UploadNftController.Post(System.String,System.String,NMKR.Shared.Classes.UploadNftClassV2)
member.summary: Upload a File to a project and pin it to IPFS
member.remarks: With this API you can upload a file to IPFS and add it to a project. You can upload the file as BASE64 Content or as URL Link or as IPFS Hash. If you submit Metadata, this Metadata will be used instead of the Metadatatemplate from the project. You can either submit Metadata or MetadataPlaceholder, but not both (because it makes no sense). The Metadata field is optional and if you dont use it, it will use the Template from your project. It is poosible to mix both versions in one project. You can have one nft with own metadata and other nfts with the template.
member.param: The apikey you have created on NMKR Studio
The uid of your project
The UploadNft Class as Body Content
member.response: Returns the UploadNftResult Class
The access was denied. (Wrong or expired APIKEY, wrong projectid etc.)
No Image Content was provided. Send a file either as Base64 or as Link or IPFS Hash
See the errormessage in the resultset for further information
There is a conflict with the provided images. Send a file either as Base64 or as Link or IPFS Hash
Internal server error - see the errormessage in the resultset
